  • Method Details

    • addProductToSite

      public boolean addProductToSite​(Site site, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int count, int price)
      Here method that add product to site
      Parameters:
      site - site with which admin works
      name - name of product
      description - description of product
      count - count of product, that users can buy
      price - price of product
      Returns:
      if it is at list of product or price or count is negative or price is 0, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct​(Site site, java.lang.String name)
      Here method that delete product from list and file
      Parameters:
      site - site with which admin works
      name - name of product
      Returns:
      if it isn't at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

    • changeProductCount

      public static boolean changeProductCount​(Site site, java.lang.String name, int count)
      Here method that change product count in list and file
      Parameters:
      site - site with which admin works
      name - name of product
      count - new count of product, that users can buy
      Returns:
      if it isn't at list of product count is negative, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

    • changeProductName

      public boolean changeProductName​(Site site, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String newName)
      Here method that change product name in list and file
      Parameters:
      site - site with which admin works
      name - name of product
      newName - new name of product
      Returns:
      if it isn't at list of product or price, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

    • changeDescription

      public boolean changeDescription​(Site site, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description)
      Here method that change product description in list and file
      Parameters:
      site - site with which admin works
      name - name of product
      description - new description of product
      Returns:
      if it isn't at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

    • changePrice

      public boolean changePrice​(Site site, java.lang.String name, int price)
      Here method that change product price in list and file
      Parameters:
      site - site with which admin works
      name - name of product
      price - new price of product
      Returns:
      if it isn't at list of product or price is negative or 0, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true
